publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-847.1 Pauline McNeill: Competition, Regulation and Business Structures in the Scottish Legal Services Marketâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-847) in the name of Kenny MacAskill, insert at end "and considers that this approach should also widen choice, provide easier access to legal services and create the conditions for more affordable services so that social justice will be at the heart of future changes."
